person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: I hear you! Let me introduce you to Bruno, the bear who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds like just what I need! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will help you relax and regain your focus. Let’s go meet him!
